name: Empyreum (MarcoNobile)
description:
Tired of studying the Divine Comedy at school? 

Then get ready for a new way of learning and discovering school content, download our game and learn while having fun!

Get ready to impersonate Dante and help him reach the end of his path, collecting the pages of the canto XXXIII and helping him in his exploits!

This project was developed on behalf of the Virtual Reality course offered by the Politecnico di Torino.

Developer Team:

  • Marco Nobile
  • Alessandro Vaccarino
  • Salvatore Galati 
  • Enrico Marando
  • Fabio Dovis

Asset:

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/
  • https://quixel.com/megascans

Controls:

  • WASD configuration for movement
  • SPACE: jump
  • M: open map
  • C: open controls
  • I: open inventory
  • Left Click: use bow (when equipped)
  • Right Click: zoom
